title: Roadmap to get prepared for programming in 2025?
content: The ever-evolving landscape of technology constantly reshapes the demand for programming skills. As we look towards 2025, several languages are poised to dominate the industry, each offering unique strengths and applications. While predicting the absolute 'best' is subjective and dependent on specific career goals, a clear picture emerges of languages that will likely be highly sought after, driving innovation and shaping the future of software development.
